ComicInfo.Summary:
The Art of War!
Distracted by the battle with Cyberforce and the android assassin Aphrodite IV, the Artifact Bearers trying to prevent the end of the Top Cow Universe are unaware that, in a distant corner of the world, the war might already be lost. The mysterious 13th Artifact Bearer holds in his hands the power to tip the scales. Has he already been seduced by the villainous architect of the master plan?
ComicInfo.Title: "Artifacts" part 7 of 13; "Origin: Coin of Solomon"
ComicInfo.Characters: Glorianna Silver,Danielle Baptiste,Necromancer,Samantha Argent,Cloaker,Magdalena,Jackie Estacado,Aphrodite IV,Stryker,Ellis,Michael Finnegan,Mali,Alina Enstrom,Tom Judge,Ripclaw,Ji Xi,Wolf,Cyblade,Ballistic,The Angelus,Witchblade,Hope Pezzini,Sabine,Interface,Sara Pezzini,Ian Nottingham,Tilly Grimes,Velocity,Curator
